str2: Thus, so, in this manner. Or (referring to what precedes or follows).
When, at which time. From hos and te; at which too, i.e. When.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
From an obsolete particle ne- and epos; not speaking, i.e. An infant; figuratively, a simple-minded person, an immature Christian.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle - 1st Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To enslave. From doulos; to enslave.
A primary preposition; under, i.e. of place, or with verbs; of place (underneath) or where (below) or time (when).
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Neuter of a presumed derivative of the base of stoicheo; something orderly in arrangement, i.e. a serial constituent, proposition.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Probably from the base of komizo; orderly arrangement, i.e. Decoration; by implication, the world (morally).
